  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>3170</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Effect-formula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Effekt-Formel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Effet-formule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Efeito-fórmula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effetto-formula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδραση-τύπος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Efecto-fo'rmula</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Learn Ohm's law and the effect formula by using these triangles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">effect formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ohm's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernen Sie Gesetz des Ohms und die 
Effektformel, indem Sie diese Dreiecke verwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apprenez la loi de l'ohm et la formule d'effet en
utilisant ces triangles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprenda a lei do ohm e a fórmula do efeito 
usando estes triângulos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impari la legge dell'Ohm e la formula di effetto 
usando questi triangoli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθετε το νόμο του ωμ και τον τύπο επίδρασης με τη 
χρησιμοποίηση αυτών των τριγώνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aprenda la ley del ohmio y el fórmula del efecto 
usando estos triángulos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bewirken Sie Formel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Ohms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">effectuez la formule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi de l'ohm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">efetue a fórmula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do ohm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">effettui la formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge dell'Ohm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επηρεάστε τον τύπο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος ωμ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">efectúe el fórmula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del ohmio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
